filterDropdownList.text: Premium - Gold-tone Steel with Leather Band

PRODUCT_PAGE_SUPPLEMENTARY_DISCLAIMERS.PRODUCT_PAGE_AWESOME_DISCLAIMER: Engineering enhancements are ongoing and may not be reflected in the pictures, videos and specifications.

seoAttributes.description: Analog Watch with Activity Tracking. Features a 1-year battery life. Stylish, timeless design. Red move bar and steps displayed on watch face. Counts steps and monitors sleep. Find out more at www.garmin.com.au
seoAttributes.seoKeywords: vivo, vivofit, fitness tracker, activity tracker, fitness band, burn fat, garmin connect, vivomove
seoAttributes.title: vívomove®

010-01597-00.pvName: vívomove™ Sport, Europe, Black with Sport Band

seo.ogDescription: Analog Watch with Activity Tracking. Features a 1-year battery life. Stylish, timeless design. Red move bar and steps displayed on watch face. Counts steps and monitors sleep. Find out more at www.garmin.com.au
seo.title: vivomove | Activity Tracking | Garmin Australia

specs.Battery life: Up to 1 year (1 x CR1632 user-replaceable)

overviewTab.content:
Classic Watch with Activity Tracking

  • Features 1-year battery life
  • Stylish, timeless design
  • Red move bar and steps displayed on watch face
  • Counts steps and monitors sleep
  • Automatically syncs¹ to Garmin Connect™ to save, plan and share progress

Add Style to Your Steps

Whether you take your steps in 3-inch heels or 3-piece suits, vívomove gives you the luxury of all-day activity tracking² without losing style. The elegant timepiece tracks steps, monitors sleep and syncs with Garmin Connect™ Mobile to view your stats in more detail.

Tells Time and “Time to Move”

In addition to time, your step progress is tracked throughout the day and can be seen on the watch face. The red move bar builds with every 15 minutes of inactivity until you reset it by walking for a couple of minutes. You can also view how many steps you’ve taken that day to get an idea of how close you are to reaching your goal.

Insights from Garmin Connect

Throughout your day, vívomove syncs to Garmin Connect Mobile¹, the only free app that gets to know you and then delivers meaningful insights based off your data to help you beat yesterday. These include cues to move if you’re not on track to meet your step goal — or shoutouts when you do hit those milestones. Plus, you’ll get healthy tips from experts that become like virtual coaches. So download and lace up. Your daily tracking just got faster, easier and, well — better.

Customize Your Watch

Stylize your watch with a variety of interchangeable bands available for vívomove. For a day at the ballpark or a black tie event, we have you covered with both casual and more upscale options such as the sleek sport band or premium leather with full steel casing.

¹When paired with a compatible smartphone
²Activity tracking accuracy

specsTab.content:
General
Strap material

silicone, TPU or leather

Lens Material

chemically strengthened glass

Bezel Material

stainless steel

Case materialpolymer or stainless steel
Quick Release bandsYes (20 mm, Industry standard)
Physical size

42 x 42 x 12 mm

Weight

sport: 51.0 g
classic: 48.0 g
premium: 67.0 g

Battery lifeUp to 1 year (1 x CR1632 user-replaceable)
Memory/History4 weeks of activity data

Clock Features
Time/dateyes (time only)
Analog hands

Health & Wellness Monitoring
SLEEP

Sensors
Accelerometer

Daily Smart Features
ConnectivityBluetooth® Smart and ANT+®
Pairs with Garmin Connect™ Mobile
Smartphone compatibilityiPhone®, Android™

Activity Tracking Features
Step counter
Move alerts (displays on device after a period of inactivity; walk for a couple of minutes to reset it)
Auto goal (learns your activity level and assigns a daily step goal)

Swimming Features
Basic rest timer (up from 0) (pool swim only)
